page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We asked people from 50 houses in our block what their employment was. This is a list of their jobs. Farm worker,housewife,cleaner,barmaid, basket maker,knitwear designer, storeman,office worker,maintenance man,factory worker, double glazer, agricultural engineer,shop assistant, H.G.V.driver,computer operator, post office worker, postman, groom, nurse, haulage contractor, gardener, odd job man, blacksmith, pilot, caterer, baker, hairdresser,1 unemployed, 2 on youth training scheme, farmer and digger driver. From 20 houses people worked in their home village. Of those who travelled to work the greatest distance was to London, the shortest to an adjoining village. People travelled to work by car, bicycle or walked. No-one used the bus to get to work.
